sentence in indonesian using the words: Tolong ambil barang di gudang.
english translation: "Please take the items from the storeroom."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya butuh guling untuk tidur.
english translation: "I need a cushion to sleep."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Gunung api tersebut masih aktif.
english translation: "The volcano is still active."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya menerima hadiah dari teman saya.
english translation: "I received a gift from my friend."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Jangan khawatir, saya akan mengurus hal tersebut.
english translation: "Don't worry, I will take care of the thing."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Halo! Apa kabar?
english translation: "Hello! How are you?"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya hampir terlambat.
english translation: "I am almost late."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya hanya butuh waktu beberapa menit.
english translation: "I only need a few minutes."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Di toko ini, harga mati.
english translation: "In this shop, it's fixed price."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Berapa harganya?
english translation: "What is the price?"

sentence in indonesian using the words: Harga pas, tidak bisa nego.
english translation: "Exact price, no negotiation."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari Jumat adalah hari terakhir kerja.
english translation: "Friday is the last working day."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari Kamis saya biasanya makan malam di luar.
english translation: "On Thursdays, I usually have dinner out."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Bimbingan belajar hanya buka pada hari kerja.
english translation: "The tutoring center is only open on working days."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Saya ingin berlibur pada hari libur.
english translation: "I want to go on a holiday on my day off."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari Minggu adalah hari untuk beristirahat.
english translation: "Sunday is a day for rest."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari Natal adalah hari perayaan keluarga.
english translation: "Christmas Day is a day for family celebrations."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari Rabu saya punya janji dengan dokter.
english translation: "I have an appointment with the doctor on Wednesday."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari Raya Idul Fitri sangat meriah.
english translation: "Eid al-Fitr is a very festive day."

sentence in indonesian using the words: Hari Sabtu saya biasanya olahraga pagi.
english translation: "On Saturdays, I usually exercise in the morning."
